ygData.subject: Infecticons
ygData.msgSnippet: Not so far away from alliance Island on the ocean floor. Frostbite monitors a globe like obect with a map of the Earth. She looks at a red beep signaled a ship

Not so far away from alliance Island on the ocean floor. Frostbite 
monitors a globe like obect with a map of the Earth. She looks at a 
red beep signaled a ship that had went down after it entered the 
planets atmosphere. She then looks to a black bot standing in the 
center of the room.

Frostbite: "Vampiza, Our scanners indicate that a ship has crashed 
here on the planet shorly after our arrival. Go, destroy the 
survivors and all there."

The tall bot looks to Frostbite and nods before it flys straight up 
into the area and through a large hatch. Outside of the Infecticon 
ship the top of the pyramid hums as a massive field is sent outwards 
and through the top of the ship pushing all the water around the 
circumfrence of the field away creating a hole. At the base of the 
field Vampiza emerges and spreads his demonic wings before its body 
is encompassed in an aura of chaochitan energy. The being then 
launches into the air through the makeshift tunnel like lightning. As 
soonas it passes the field tursn off leaving the ocean to crash back 
in on itself as Vampiza heads off to the site where Blindchaos and 
Domnijoe's ship had crashed.
